QuestData.Title: WANTED: Gorgebeak
QuestData.Description:
Thief! Pilferer! Menace!
The insidious menace known as Gorgebeak threatens our harvest of ambrosi for tribute to our great Archon. She must be stopped!
If any are willing to take on this foul fowl, I have tracked her nest to the western edges of Firstborne's Bounty. Proof of her demise shall be amply rewarded.
--Gerdus
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: If her reign of terror continues our harvest will be ruined!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Gorgebeak's Bill for Gerdus in Firstborne's Bounty.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring Gorgebeak's Bill to Gerdus in Firstborne's Bounty.
QuestData.RewardText: Our harvest is saved! Oh thank you, brave adventurer, our tribute may be saved yet!
